title: Was demoted because of inactivity because I couldn't get into champ select
body:
Hey, So i was trying to get into champ select and i keep getting a black screen. I've uninstalled and reinstalled the game over 5 times. Whenever I get lucky and i can enter a game, the next day the black screen comes back. I was able to get 1 ranked game since the demote and now, I have another 8 days before Inactivity again. If I could get advice how to fix this issue because, if i can't fix this soon i will decay even more. This bug has already caused me to lose my diamond rank and i don't want this to snowball even harder when i simply can't fix it. 
-Beastmania

replies.body:
Black screens during champ select are usually an indication that your client hasn't been able to properly connect to the matchmaking service. Conflicting network settings are the most common causes for this, so I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a next step.

Let me know if those solutions resolved this for you.

Hello, can you try using Hextech Repair Tool:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool

Black screen usually means firewall issue. That being said, nothing can stop inactivity decay, sorry.
